login_welcome: Welcome back! Please login to continue

homePage.aboutme: I'm Mohammad Awad Falah, a passionate Frontend Developer who loves crafting creative and high-performance web experiences. I specialize in modern technologies like Vue.js and always aim to deliver clean, user-friendly designs.

skillsPage.vue: A modern JavaScript framework. Experienced in developing complex apps with Vue 3 and the Composition API.
skillsPage.html-css: Fundamental web building languages. Experience with HTML5 and CSS3 with a focus on responsive design and accessibility.
skillsPage.javaScript: Core web programming language. Experience with ES6+, Promise, Async/Await, and working with APIs.
skillsPage.tailwind: A top-notch CSS framework. Experience using Tailwind to build fast, maintainable user interfaces.
skillsPage.typeScript: JavaScript with data type syntax. Experience using TypeScript with Vue.js to build more robust and maintainable applications.
skillsPage.primeVue: A rich UI library for Vue.js components. Experience using PrimeVue components to build professional user interfaces.
skillsPage.quasar: Vue.js-based framework for building web, mobile, and desktop apps.
skillsPage.nuxt: Framework built on top of Vue.js for building universal, SEO-friendly apps.
skillsPage.vuetify: A Vue UI library with pre-made Material Design components for building beautiful and responsive applications.

aboutPage.S1D: Displays content to users through HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and vue.js and other. Manages layout, styling, and visual elements (buttons, forms, tables, etc.) with a focus on intuitive user experience.
aboutPage.S2D: Optimizes load times and responsiveness using modern techniques like lazy loading, caching strategies, code splitting, and efficient asset delivery.
aboutPage.S3D: Connects front-end to back-end systems via RESTful or GraphQL APIs to display dynamic data while ensuring security, performance, and reliability.
aboutPage.bodycontent: I'm Mohammad Awad Falah, a passionate Frontend Developer with a love for technology and design. Currently, I work at Visual Innovate, where I contribute to turning creative ideas into tangible digital experiences.
aboutPage.quote: "I believe the web is an art canvas, and code is my brush. Every line of code is an opportunity to create something amazing"
aboutPage.content: At just 20 years old, I've built a successful career in front-end development. I started my journey in my first year of college, majoring in computer science, and I'm still evolving and learning.
aboutPage.skillstitle: I possess a diverse set of technical and creative skills that enable me to provide integrated solutions :
aboutPage.problemSolvingText: I don't just see codes, I see solutions to business challenges.
aboutPage.fastLearningText: My ability to absorb new technologies in record time
aboutPage.ageExperienceText: A rare blend of young ambition and professional experience.
aboutPage.creativeVisionText: Deep understanding of user experience along with technical skills

footer.h1: Looking for an exceptional Frontend Developer?
footer.p: I will be your partner in turning your vision into an amazing digital reality. Let's discuss how I can add value to your team.

Contactme.title: Contact Me
Contactme.subtitle: Send me a message and I will reply as soon as possible
